pm.expect(responseJson.errorMessage).to.eql("An error occurred when saving the medical records. Please review the file to ensure that the records are valid and have not been submitted before.");

response.name: 409 - Conflict

item.description: This endpoint allows users to securely upload a .CSV file containing medical records. Upon successful upload, the system processes the data and returns a list of medical record in response.
